title: As He Considers A Run For President, Rand Paul Tries to Rebrand Himself
teaser: The New Yorker's Ryan Lizza says the Republican's earlier views on foreign policy and his opposition to the Civil Rights Act may dog him, as well as the extreme libertarianism of his father, Ron Paul.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
